text: "Ultraviolet (Light My Way)" is a 1991 song by Irish rock band U2 and is the tenth track from their seventh studio album Achtung Baby. The song is about love, dependency and religious interpretations, with listens finding allusions to the Book of Job. It was not released as a single. ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:U2 songs
title: Ultraviolet (Light My Way)
